results.name: Singles Original Slices
results.description:
Kraft Singles slices are the classic cheese slice with an unmistakable taste. Kraft Singles are free of artificial flavours and colours so you can your family can feel good about eating these delicious, creamy slices. Enjoy Kraft Singles on your next grilled cheese, sandwich, or burger. There are so many delicious ways to enjoy the ooey gooey melt of Kraft Singles. Singles are good source of calcium and high in protein. Proudly made in Canada.
  • Classic cheese slice with the perfect melt
  • Creamy texture and delicious flavour
  • Made with No Artificial Flavours or Colours
  • Enjoy Kraft Singles on your grilled cheese, sandwich or burger

Rudolph's.

Since 1951.

At Rudolph's we're proud to combine the finest natural Canadian grains with Bavarian baking traditions to bring you our delicious breads.

results.name: Smooth Peanut Butter
results.description:
Kraft Smooth Peanut Butter is a family favourite and a Canadian classic. With our signature delicious, nutty flavour and irresistible, creamy texture, Kraft Smooth Peanut Butter is made with high quality dry-roasted peanuts to bring out the best flavour and aroma. Try Kraft Peanut Butter on toast, sandwiches and fruits or vegetables. Our smooth peanut butter is also great for using in sauces, marinades, smoothies, cookies and other pastries. Or, you can eat this tasty peanut butter by the spoonful as a quick snack! Kraft Peanut Butter is Canada's favourite Peanut Butter, and is proudly prepared in Canada. Make Together, Stick Together.
  • Signature delicious, nutty taste and creamy texture
  • Made with high quality dry-roasted peanuts
  • Great for using in sauces, marinades, smoothies, cookies and other pastries
  • Canada's Favourite Peanut Butter
  • Proudly prepared in Canada

results.name: White Bread White Texas
results.description: Make each day a little softer by biting into our thick-cut, pillowy soft sliced whole wheat bread. Each loaf is baked in Canada and contains 15 essential nutrients. No artificial flavours, colours or preservatives. Perfect for French toast or for sandwiches. Our Softest Wonder, Championing the Power of Softness.

results.name: White Baguette
results.description:
Our ACE Bakery® bread is made using our aged starters, simple ingredients and traditional techniques, but it's anything but ordinary.

An iconic staple, our ACE Bakery® White Baguette is baked in a stone-deck oven giving it a golden crisp crust with a creamy, fully developed flavour. Turn it into a sandwich, slice it, layer it, dip it - whatever you decide, we know you'll love it.

Everyday Inspiration:Go simple and spread with butter or dip it in olive oil.Hosting Inspiration:Recreate a fan favourite and use as the base for a tomato and basil bruschetta.

Visit us at ACEBakery.com to learn more about our recipes.

results.name: Bread, Herb & Garlic
results.description:
Country Harvest® Herb & Garlic will be your new favourite seasoned sandwich bread or toasted savoury snack!

Country Harvest® Herb & Garlic will be your new favourite seasoned sandwich bread or toasted savoury snack! Baked with fragrant herbs, roasted garlic and whole grains, our Herb & Garlic seasoned bread is a source of fibre and contains no artificial flavours or colours.

As grain experts, we’re proud to offer a variety of delicious loaves and bagels baked with whole grains, so you can find the balance of taste and goodness that’s right for you.


  • Baked in Canada
  • SEASONED HERB BREAD
  • Made with whole grains
  • Source of fiber
  • 24 g of whole grains
  • Source of 14 essential nutrients
  • No artificial colours or flavours
  • No high fructose corn syrup

results.name: Rustic Italian Oval
results.description:
Our ACE Bakery® bread is made using our aged starters, simple ingredients and traditional techniques, but it's anything but ordinary.

Baked in a stone-deck oven for a crisp golden crust and a light and airy interior, our ACE Bakery® Rustic Italian Oval is delicate in taste, making it the perfect complement to a Sunday brunch or a Saturday night get-together.

Everyday Inspiration:Effortlessly elevate your lunch by creating a sweet potato sandwich with shredded cheddar and fresh rosemary.Hosting Inspiration:Serve sliced, toasted and topped with a selection of different spreads.

Visit us at ACEBakery.com to learn about our bread.

results.name: No Sugar Whole Wheat
results.description: Grab Life by the Grains™.New look.25 g whole grains.3 g fibre.5 g protein.By portion of 40 g.100% whole grains.It takes the best elements to make every day successful. With a nutritious and great-tasting blend of whole grains and high quality ingredients, you'll have what it takes to conquer anything. You've got the bread, now it's time to show the day what you're made of.

results.name: Bavarian Multigrain Loaf
results.description: Since 1913. 100 Years Of Rye Baking Tradition. In 1913, Fred Rubschlager Founded The Rubschlager Baking Corporation In Chicago. With His Five Brothers, He Developed The Rye-Baking Tradition That Goes Into All Of Our European-Style Breads.

results.description: Delicatessen rye bread made with natural spring water.

results.name: White Bread
results.description: Get the classic taste your family knows and loves with Dempster's® White Bread. Made using our simplest ingredients, this soft bread is a popular choice for sandwiches, toast and so much more. Each loaf is made in Canada with Canadian wheat flour and contains no artificial flavours or colours. Keep a loaf on hand for breakfast, lunch or dinner any day of the week.

results.name: Squirrelly Bread
results.description:
SPROUTING UNLOCKS WHOLE GRAINS TO DELIVER:.

- Higher levels of nutrients.

- Easier digestion.

- Better absorption

SPROUTED WHOLE GRAINS = MORE NUTRIENTS.

Our family discovered sprouted whole grains at a health retreat 30 years ago, and we've been unleashing whole grains' superpowers ever since. We stuffed Sprouted Power Squirrelly bread with enough sesame and sunflower seeds to fill our furry friends cheeks-and fuel you with high fibre so you can hit the trail or just conquer mountains of paperwork..

STAN, KATHY & BRAD AND THE SILVER HILLS BAKERY FAMILY

Fresh in-store baked bread

results.name: 22 Grains & Seeds Bread
results.description: Oroweat Organic® 22 Grains & Seeds Bread is a fresh and tasty bread that's sustainably baked*. Each fresh and delicious loaf is made with high-quality, certified organic ingredients. Bursting with flavour, the seed bread is high in fibre, a source of omega-3 polyunsaturated fat and free from artificial colours, flavours and preservatives. And as a member of 1% for the Planet, we always donate 1% of our revenues to environmental causes. * We match 100% of the electricity usage that goes into baking Oroweat® bread with electricity produced from renewable sources.

results.name: 100% Whole Grain Bread
results.description: Oroweat Organic® 100% Whole Grain Bread is a fresh and tasty bread that's sustainably baked*. Bursting with flavour, the certified organic bread is high in fibre, a source of 5 essential nutrients and has 43 grams of whole grains per 80g serving. Each delicious and nutritious loaf is also low in saturated fat and free from artificial colours, flavours and preservatives. And as a member of 1% for the Planet, we always donate 1% of our revenues to environmental causes. * We match 100% of the electricity usage that goes into baking Oroweat® bread with electricity produced from renewable sources.

results.name: Smiles Potatoes
results.description:
It’s
  hard not to be happy when you serve McCain Smiles potatoes. These fun and
  delicious mashed potato shaped Smiles are sure to brighten everyone’s day.
  Playful and pleasing, kids of all ages will gobble up these crispy Smiles
  potatoes that are ready in a jiffy. Serve them up as an easy side dish with
  your next meal or as a fast snack and you can be sure that every member of
  your family will definitely be happy to see these delicious McCain
  Smiles.

results.name: SuperSpirals Lightly Spiced Fries
results.description:
Get a
  new spin on snack time with McCain SuperSpirals lightly spiced fries. These
  spiral cut fries make for a fast and delicious side that are fun for the
  whole family. Curly shaped and lightly spiced, McCain spiral fries are an
  epic twist on a classic treat that everyone will enjoy. They're made from
  specially selected potatoes, and are trans-fat and cholesterol-free so you
  can feel good about serving them to your family. Easy to prepare, our curly
  fries make dinner fast and delicious any day of the week.

results.name: Tasti Taters Potato Bites
results.description:
When
  is food tasty and fun? When it's McCain Tasti Taters. Made from real
  potatoes, Tasti Taters are bite-sized bits of deliciousness - crispy on the
  outside and soft on the inside. So easy to prepare - just pop them into a
  pre-heated oven or toaster oven for about 25 minutes and you'll be all set to
  add excitement for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Serve McCain Tasti Taters as a
  fast and easy dinner side dish with your family's next meal and you'll find
  out that your kids won't be the only ones having fun.

results.name: Breakfast Potato Pancakes
results.description: Enjoy the great taste of potato pancakes without all the work. McCain Potato Pancakes are so easy to prepare they make mealtime a snap. These delicious breakfast potatoes are made with real shredded potatoes that have been lightly seasoned with onions and spices and are perfect to enjoy with breakfast or as a side dish at dinner. A savoury treat, these potato pancakes are also trans-fat and cholesterol free so you can feel good serving them to your family.
